body_html: I just realized that this PR might create some issues with standalone build of ATen, because it's a subtree and it won't have the .gitmodules file in the root. I think it might be enough to just check it in with the paths slightly patched up.
body_text: I just realized that this PR might create some issues with standalone build of ATen, because it's a subtree and it won't have the .gitmodules file in the root. I think it might be enough to just check it in with the paths slightly patched up.
body: I just realized that this PR might create some issues with standalone build of ATen, because it's a subtree and it won't have the `.gitmodules` file in the root. I think it might be enough to just check it in with the paths slightly patched up.
